awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Summer Conference on General Topologyand Applications
awd_abstract_narration: This project will support a conference entitled Summer                     Conference on General Topology and Applications.  It will be held               June 14-16 at the C.W. Post Campus of Long Island University.                   The goals of the conference are (1) to facilitate communication                 and collaboration among topologists from a wide geographic area,                (2) to improve communication between topologists and                            mathematicians in related fields, (3) to bring to the                           participants the leading researchers and latest developments in                 the field, and (4) to expose advanced graduate students to the                  excitement and intense research activity of this conference.  The               principal speakers are A.V. Arhangel'skii, B. Banaschewski, W.W.                Comfort, Gruenhage, B. Mandelbrot, and S. Watson.  The                          proceedings of the conference will be published by Marcel Dekker.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
